member.name: T:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI
member.summary: Provides easy access to the XboxLeaders API.

member.name: M:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI.DownloadProfileData(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the profile data for a the specified gamer tag.
member.param: The gamer tag to download profile data for.

member.name: M:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI.DownloadGameData(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the game data for a the specified gamer tag.
member.param: The gamer tag to download game data for.

member.name: M:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI.DownloadGameAchievements(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Downloads the achievements for a the specified gamer tag and game ID.
member.param: The gamer tag of the player of the game.
The ID of the game to download achievements for.

member.name: M:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI.DownloadFriendList(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the friend list for the specified gamer tag.
member.param: The gamer tag to download the friends list for.

member.name: M:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI.DownloadImage(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads an image from the specified URL.
member.returns: Returns a Bitmap object containing the downloaded image.

member.name: M:XboxLeadersNETWrapper.XboxLeadersAPI.DateTimeFromEpoc(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts a unix time to a DateTime object.
member.returns: Returns a DateTime object set to the date and time of the unix format.
